Description.Text: Qbic Amsterdam WTC is a contemporary 3-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in south Amsterdam. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, excellent transport links and a good location in the World Trade Centre Amsterdam. Amsterdam South is cosmopolitan in its composition, ranging from the typical Dutch working class area of De Pijp to the leafy middle-class district of Buitenveldert. Regional places of interest include the bustling Albert Cuyp Market and the Zuidas, a rapidly developing business district home to the World Trade Center Amsterdam. Amsterdam Zuid train station and several tram stops are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Amsterdam destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern high-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple, modern style with parquet flooring, mood lighting and interactive display panels which allow guests to choose from a range of patterns and artworks. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, work desk, safe and air-conditioning. The open-plan en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Vending machines in the lobby offer a range of drinks and snacks. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
